name: SUPER MEGA METROPOLITAN KARATE KICKING SLIME KILLING X-TERMINATOR 40,000
name_original: SUPER MEGA METROPOLITAN KARATE KICKING SLIME KILLING X-TERMINATOR 40,000
description:
Throw slimes against walls, and use the various properties of their sticky corpses to navigate through the levels! Try to find all the hidden tokens in each level!

Created for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2018 (https://itch.io/jam/bscotch2018) Theme: sticky justice, Achievements: maverick

--Credits:

Programming / Art: me

Engine:

Impact.js (https://impactjs.com)

Music:

Facehammer by Ozzed

Here Comes The 8-Bit Empire by Ozzed

https://ozzed.net
